about_the_game:
Program Generated
Content such as monsters, resources, paths, dungeon exits, and more, are all generated by the program and hidden in the mist, waiting to be discovered.

Various Monsters
Monsters with varying abilities are scattered throughout the dungeon, blocking paths or guarding treasures. They may seem insignificant when encountered alone, but a random combination of them can pose a significant threat.

Abundant Builds
With hundreds of functionally diverse cards, paired with dozens of unique artifacts, and a range of classes with varying playstyles, build your powerful deck to tackle challenging situations.

Craft Cards
Your cards can be infinitely upgraded, with numerous affixes stacked on them, making them even more powerful and unique.

Transcending Limitations
Although the game incorporates the concept of classes, and cards also have their respective class types, they are universal in nature, allowing for the possibility of combining cards from all classes together.

Constant Evolution
As you delve deeper into the dungeon, monsters will evolve into more advanced forms and acquire additional special abilities to hinder your progress.

Powerful BOSS
Each floor of the dungeon will feature a randomly generated and unpredictable elite, standing alone as a formidable opponent. You must defeat it to proceed to the next floor. Moreover, the game also boasts several powerful and unique lords who are constantly on the lookout to bring your journey to an end!

Unlimited Heritage
If you are unfortunately defeated in battle, as long as you have a few coins left in your pocket, you can carry over your hard-earned cards to the next game.

No-Unlock Gameplay
In the game, there are no enhancements that require players to spend a lot of time unlocking. Everything relies solely on skill and a little(or a lot of) luck.

Endless challenges
The game currently does not have a concept of completion or ending the game, you can always take your deck deep into the dungeon and constantly break records.

name: Monster&Strategy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: An adventure card game set in a dungeon, featuring a maze generated by the program, unpredictable monster combinations, and a vast array of cards and artifacts. Players must measure the trade-offs and build their unique deck!
